description: Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node CLI commands.

commands.name: az mcc ent node create
commands.summary: Creates a Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node with specified parameters.
commands.syntax:
az mcc ent node create --cache-node-name
                       --host-os {Eflow, Linux, Windows}
                       --mcc-resource-name
                       --resource-group
                       [--tags]

commands.name: az mcc ent node delete
commands.summary: Deletes a Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node.

commands.name: az mcc ent node get-provisioning-details
commands.summary: Retrieves Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node details and keys needed to provision cache node.

commands.name: az mcc ent node list
commands.summary: Retrieves relevant information about all Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache nodes under the Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise resource.
commands.syntax:
az mcc ent node list --mcc-resource-name
                     --resource-group
                     [--expand-output {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                     [--max-items]
                     [--next-token]

commands.name: az mcc ent node show
commands.summary: Retrieves relevant information for a Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node.
commands.syntax:
az mcc ent node show [--cache-node-name]
                     [--expand-output {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                     [--ids]
                     [--mcc-resource-name]
                     [--resource-group]
                     [--subscription]

commands.name: az mcc ent node update
commands.summary: Configures a Microsoft Connected Cache for Enterprise cache node with specified configuration parameters.
commands.syntax:
az mcc ent node update [--add]
                       [--auto-update-day]
                       [--auto-update-ring {Fast, Preview, Slow}]
                       [--auto-update-time]
                       [--auto-update-week]
                       [--cache-drive]
                       [--cache-node-name]
                       [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                       [--ids]
                       [--mcc-resource-name]
                       [--proxy {Disabled, Enabled, None, Required}]
                       [--proxy-host]
                       [--proxy-port]
                       [--remove]
                       [--resource-group]
                       [--set]
                       [--subscription]
                       [--tags]

commands.name: az mcc ent node wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
